page.title: 09LYNEHAM SHOPS
page.content:
I GO TO THE SHOPS IN LYNEHAM AND I GO TO THE N.A.F.F.I. IT IS JUST DQWN THE ROAD.YOU CAN BUY SWEETS THERE.YOU CAN AISO BUY KETTLES AND BIKES MANDY ABRAHAM 6YRS THERE IS A BOWLING ALLEY ON CAMP,IT IS NOT A SHOP BUT YOU CAN BUY THINGS LIKE CRISPS THERE. ALAN ALDERSON 6YRS.
MR HANCOCK SELLS BIKES AND ALL SORTS OF THINGS LIKE PAINT AND SCREWS AND PLUGS. I LIKE THIS SHOP.IT IS USEFUL KATY SIMONDS 6YRS. THEREIS A FRUIT SHOP ANDNMRS SIMONDS AND TRACY BUY THE RABBIT FOOD THERE. ONCE ME AND STEPHANIE WENT WITH TRACY TO BUY THE FOOD.
SIAN GIBSON 7YRS.
